uvi.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v5.10.52
uvi.description:
memory: fsl_ifc: fix leak of private memory on probe failure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.52 by commit b5789e23773f4a852fbfe244b63f675e265d3a7f, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit a20cbdeffce247a2b6fb83cd8d22433994068565. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: memory: fsl_ifc: fix leak of private memory on probe failure
